page.title: 13INDUSTRY - WASTE DISPOSAL
page.content:
At Low Dyke, the firm of H.& E.Trotter contract to undertake disposal of major quantities of industrial, domestic, building and farming waste. The field of the firm's operations extends on a radius of some 30 miles and more.
Removal of waste is by means of skips which are taken to site and left for filling, and then lifted full and brought back to Low Dyke. Disposal of this waste is either by burning, scrap metal sale, or other means.
Farm slurry waste is removed to Low Dyke from surrounding farms by means of large slurry tankers, and the waste disposed of by approved means.
